full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3764827989-Doc3764858610
* **Publication Date**: 2023-01-30
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-02-16T14:00:00 (Currently, this date has been amended from its original scheduled time. Bids shall be submitted by 14:00 EST on this date)
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (Government Department)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Tenderers to submit a Request for Proposal for a Scanning LiDAR Sensor.

## Notice URL

The full Notice can be found at: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15264918?extsite=MTUyNjQ5MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**:
  + 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
  + Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
* **End User Entity**: National Research Council of Canada (NRC)
* **End User Entity Address**:
  + 100 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0R6

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions, please contact:

* **Jessie Canas**
* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
* **Email**: [jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Note:** Please be advised that bids submitted after 14:00 EST on the closing date of the tender will be declared non-compliant. Please disregard the originally published closing time.

Please be aware that the original requested information and details are provided as they are. Do not use any unusual formatting that might show up in the rewrapped notice. You can modify details information if there is redundancy. 

However, maintain the same essential information required by the project team.
